mapper.insert: insert into region (id, pid, name, type, post_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into region
id,
pid,
name,
type,
post_code,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update region
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: id, name, describe, pic_url, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into brand (id, name, describe, pic_url, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into brand
id,
name,
describe,
pic_url,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
is_deleted,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update brand
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update brand set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
